content.en: Event-based vision: Researchers are exploring the potential of event-based cameras and algorithms in the field of computer vision. They are investigating whether these cameras can improve contour motion estimation, compute the Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) of visual scenes with high temporal precision, estimate rotational motion, perform visual-inertial odometry, achieve 3D reconstruction, track corners in real-time, and more. The algorithms developed for these tasks aim to exploit the characteristics of event-based cameras and improve their performance in various computer vision applications.
content.da: Begivenhedsbaseret vision: Forskere undersøger potentialet ved begivenhedsbaserede kameraer og algoritmer inden for computervision. De undersøger, om disse kameraer kan forbedre konturbevægelsesestimation, beregne den Hurtige Fourier Transformation (FFT) af visuelle scener med høj tidsmæssig præcision, estimere rotationsbevægelse, udføre visuel-inertiel odometri, opnå 3D-rekonstruktion, spore hjørner i realtid og mere. De algoritmer, der udvikles til disse opgaver, sigter mod at udnytte karakteristikaene ved begivenhedsbaserede kameraer og forbedre deres ydeevne i forskellige computervisionsapplikationer.
